trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="list" /> element from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).
trans-unit.target: 按 WWW 联合会 (W3C) 指定的方式显示 <see langword="list" /> 来自 XML 架构的元素。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used to define a <see langword="simpleType" /> element as a list of values of a specified data type.
trans-unit.target: 此类可用于将 <see langword="simpleType" /> 元素定义为指定数据类型的值的列表。

trans-unit.source: When a data type is derived from a list data type, the following constraining facets can be used: `length`, `maxLength`, `minLength`, `enumeration`, `pattern`, and `whiteSpace`.
trans-unit.target: 当从列表数据类型派生数据类型时，可以使用以下约束方面： `length`， `maxLength`， `minLength`， `enumeration`， `pattern`，和`whiteSpace`。

trans-unit.source: For each `length`, `maxLength`, and `minLength`, the unit of length is measured in number of list items.
trans-unit.target: 每个`length`， `maxLength`，和`minLength`，长度的单元的测量单位为列表项的数目。

trans-unit.source: The value of `whiteSpace` is fixed to the `collapse` value.
See <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType> for an example using this class.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType>有关使用此类的示例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeList" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeList" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType" /> representing the type of the <see langword="simpleType" /> element based on the <see cref="P:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeList.ItemType" /> and <see cref="P:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeList.ItemTypeName" /> values of the simple type.
trans-unit.target: 根据简单类型的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeList.ItemType" /> 值，获取或设置表示该 <see langword="simpleType" /> 元素类型的 <see cref="P:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeList.ItemTypeName" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType" /> representing the type of the <see langword="simpleType" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see langword="simpleType" /> 元素的类型的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is a post-schema-compilation-infoset property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是后架构编译信息集属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see langword="simpleType" /> element that is derived from the type specified by the base value.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置从基值指定的类型中派生的 <see langword="simpleType" /> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The item type for the simple type element.
trans-unit.target: 简单类型元素的项类型。

trans-unit.source: The base value must be a QName.
The use of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeList.ItemTypeName%2A> and `ItemType` are mutually exclusive.
Gets or sets the name of a built-in data type or <see langword="simpleType" /> element defined in this schema (or another schema indicated by the specified namespace).
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置内置数据类型的名称或在该架构（或由指定命名空间指示的另一架构）中定义的 <see langword="simpleType" /> 元素的名称。

trans-unit.source: The type name of the simple type list.
trans-unit.target: 简单类型列表的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: The simple type list value must be a QName.
trans-unit.target: 简单类型列表值必须是 QName。

trans-unit.source: The use of `ItemTypeName` and <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeList.ItemType%2A> are mutually exclusive.
